************************************* isPalindrome public boolean isPalindrome(){ if (size() % 2 ){ // for odd length sequences, revcomp($synthetic) = $synthetic is palindrome // where $synthetic is $seq with middle letter removed. int halfLen = (int)(size()/2); int end1 = halfLen-1; int start2 = halfLen+1; int end2 = seq.size()-1; SequenceBuffer synthetic = data.substring[0..end1]+seq[start2..end2]; Sequence rev = synthetic.reverseComplementCopy(); // println "seq=$seq\tsynthetic=$synthetic\trev=$rev" return (rev == synthetic); }else{ rev = seq.reverseComplementCopy(); return(rev == seq); } }
